summary: Music Replacer for  hellstorm102s main menu wallpaper replacer HD  and Skyradio. Replaces Music for main title and add music for  Supernastypants\' SkyRadio mod.
descriptionHtml:
Mod Requirements:
You need: 
\"main menu wallpaper replacer HD 1080p now with randomizer\" - by hellstorm102.
Found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708



My second mod on the Nexus I hope you enjoy the work i put into converting the file formats for you and setting most of it up for easy installation, Because it did take a while to do.

This add-on supplies you with a total of 5 songs for your listening enjoyment
5 songs from Malukah
If you like this add-on PLEASE endorse it and i hope the instructions for the \"More\" folder are not to confusing.

Installation for the Main Menu re-placer:
1st : Instal main menu music into the main DATA folder 
example: if you installed it properly
steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/music/special/A-U/mus_maintheme.xwm <<<<<
2nd: instal custom music mainmenuwallpapers folders into steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
example: if you installed it properly
steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/mainmenuwallapers/A/Data/music/SPECIAL/mus_maintheme.xwm <<<<<

Optional found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10657



Malukah \"Reignite\" http://www.malukah.com/free/
(Folder A,F,K,P,U) Age of Agression
(Folder B,G,L,Q)   Age of Opression
(Folder C,H,M,R)   Dragonborn Comes
(Folder D,I,N,S)   Reignite
(Folder E,J,O,T)   Tale of the Tongues


For the Sky Radio Files
You need: 
As well as  Supernastypants\' \"SkyRadio\" mod if you choose to grab them.
Found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15024

Installation for SkyRadio Files:
INSTALLATION:
If you want to add all tracks to skyradio choose what section will start with \"track1\"(really doesn\'t matter what starts with track1 as skyradio plays them randomly anyway) then rename the rest of the tracks accordingly make sure the file names are \"track1-47\"(without the quotes) I.E. 
track1
track2
track3
ect.
then place all files into one file and copy/paste to your skyrim/data/music/skyradio and enjoy
all files are in the appropriate format.

You can download Skyradio from http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15024
 

SkyRadio
Track List



Malukah
(track1) Age of Agression
(track2) Age of Opression
(track3) Dragonborn Comes
(track4) Reignite
(track5) Tale of the Tongues 		

If you would like to grab my other mod you can find it here:
ALL PERKS- CRAFTING ITEMS and more - now with DG Crafting ITEMS
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21902

Feel Free to edit use or reload - Just make sure to Give credit not only to me but to the GREAT Composers of each song, It\'s called Citing them and they like that sort of thing,

Thanks to:

The Highly Talented Composers of each song and or album

hellstorm102 For the wonderful Mod and updates
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708

KiwiX For the awesome add-on to Hellstorm102\'s Mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10657

Supernastypants For the wonderful Mod and updates
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15024

and to:
Robin Scott - for the Skyrim Nexus \"Supporting Game Mods for...... A LONG ass time LOL\"
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/

Disclaimer:
I, Nor the Nexus site, in no way claim ownership to any of the files contained, the Copy-writes for each file belong to and are held by the respective composers of each song and or album. They are placed here for the purpose of enhancing one\'s game experience and in no way (that I know of) can be played on anything BUT within games. Any use of material other than intended, are subject to penalties under their respective copy-writes.
author: Wolfpyre
